SELECT e.id AS empId, e.name AS empName, e.position_code AS positionCode, pos.name AS positionName, e.dept_code AS deptCode, dept.name AS deptName, TO_CHAR(vh.start_date, 'YYYY-MM-DD') AS vacationStartDate, TO_CHAR(vh.end_date, 'YYYY-MM-DD') AS vacationEndDate, vh.remark FROM vacation_history vh JOIN employee e ON vh.employee_id = e.id JOIN approval a ON vh.approval_id = a.id LEFT JOIN detail_sys_code pos ON e.position_code = pos.detail_code AND pos.main_code = 'POS' LEFT JOIN detail_sys_code dept ON e.dept_code = dept.detail_code AND dept.main_code = 'DEP'
AND a.id = #{srhApprovalId}
AND a.approval_status_code = 'APV002'
AND (e.name LIKE '%' || #{srhIdOrName} || '%' OR e.id LIKE '%' || #{srhIdOrName} || '%')
AND ( (vh.start_date BETWEEN TO_DATE(#{vacationStartDate}, 'YYYY-MM-DD') AND TO_DATE(#{vacationEndDate}, 'YYYY-MM-DD')) OR (vh.end_date BETWEEN TO_DATE(#{vacationStartDate}, 'YYYY-MM-DD') AND TO_DATE(#{vacationEndDate}, 'YYYY-MM-DD')) OR (vh.start_date <= TO_DATE(#{vacationStartDate}, 'YYYY-MM-DD') AND vh.end_date >= TO_DATE(#{vacationEndDate}, 'YYYY-MM-DD')) )
AND e.dept_code = #{deptCode}
ORDER BY vh.start_date DESC
